Articles.Content:
A video done by the popular youtuber, TheGameTheorists, has brought to my attention the idea of launching rocket propelled rods from the space gods at any opposing force... Also to troll my kerbals. (As in, blow up the KSC.) 

[https://www.youtube.com/user/MatthewPatrick13](https://www.youtube.com/user/MatthewPatrick13)

(Go here for the video. It'll be called Game Theory: Why Call Of Duty Ghosts Should Terrify You.)

So, how exactly will we do this? I dunno, It's up to you to figure out.

Obligatory Scott Manley:

KSP won't have stock weapons, it's addons only, moved to addon affairs.
This was researched in real life: [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinetic_bombardment](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinetic_bombardment) (popularly called "Rods from God")
